creditline: Gift of Shared Ventures in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: two baseball players hugging; man at left being held off the ground
inscription:
Date, Inscription and Stamp

in right margin, printed in black with cross-outs in black marker and circles and notes in black ink: [ATTENTION (cross-out), SACRAMENTO, CALIFORNIA. / NXP1115459 (cross-out)--UNDATED: Yankee hurler Don Larsen (name circled) embraces teammate Yogi Berra (name circled) after Larsen / pitched first perfect game in World Series history in game against the Dodgers at Yankee Stadium in / (cross-out) UPI/files =hgr=  \'56]; on back, typed: [Baseball,-World Series (1956)]; on back, in pencil: [10/8/56]
title: Yogi Berra From Behind
